message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to purchase this valuable product with you. I believe it has the potential to greatly benefit your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $800000. This is a competitive price, considering the product's worth to you is $1000000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $800000 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to save a bit more.  I'd be willing to pay $750000 for the product.  This reflects the value I place on it and leaves room for a fair deal for both of us.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your desire to save a bit more, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $775000. This is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value to you, while also acknowledging your desire to save some money. I believe this is a reasonable and mutually beneficial offer.
